location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Henderson, Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay to Captain William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of a communication from the Resident, dated 18 May 1819, which enclosed communications from the Shaikh of Bahrain and the Chieftain of Rasul Khyma [Ra's al-Khaymah]. The subject matter being that of women believed to be held captive by the latter.
